about_the_game:
Story

Follow Amar on his journey of self discovery and redemption. His life has been more difficult than he even knew, and he's hurt many people. Knowing he can't escape his past, he must make the decision himself to right his wrongs and save the world.



Combat

Ex Angelus prioritizes itself with its high paced combat. Dash and zip around, evading enemy attacks. Push your aggression by constantly attacking and keeping your Flow Gauge High. Manage your damage output by balancing your stamina and using your Series Circuit abilities to push your output to the limit. The thrill of battle is the only thing that will keep you alive in these tough battles. Can you handle it?



Beautiful Music and Scenery

Ex Angelus leaves you breath taken with gorgeous locales and beautiful backdrops. The colors and lights draw you in to a world worth exploring. The music is a mix of high action and soothing vibes inspired by Jungle, Breakcore and Rock, to match the setting. With all kinds of puzzles to solve, and sections to platform on, you'll find the world challenging to go through.
